noun.description: The action of killing oneself intentionally.
examples: he committed suicide at the age of forty

noun.description: A running drill consisting of a sprint to a set point (especially a line on a basketball court) and back to the start, immediately followed by additional sprints of lengthening distances.
examples: we shot free throws and if we missed we ran suicides
he leaves the service and then suicides

origin: Mid 17th century: from modern Latin suicidium act of suicide, suicida person who commits suicide, from Latin sui of oneself + caedere kill.
